reviewText: I met Billy Steers a few years ago in LaPorte Indiana, stayed at the same bed and breakfast the year of the tornado. What a great guy, sat in on a couple of his classess, interacts well with the kids as well as the grownups. Very educational.

This was enjoyed by adults as well as my 2 1/2 year old grandson. He has the stories memorized page  by page. It was interesting to see how the pictures were drawn. Tractors are his all time favorite. I have a couple more books to buy to complete his collection.
Watched it with my preK son who enjoyed it.  Same format as John Deere series with same type music.  Good illustrations from the books.

My one year old and three year old LOVE the Tractor Mac books, so they always request to watch this when they get some TV time.  I like that it's kind of "Reading Rainbow" style with the author reading the books and the camera showing the illustrations, no animations.  Then there is real footage of antique tractors in between stories which reminds the kids of our hometown parades, so that's fun.  I just wish they would make more than one of these shows!
Great show for kids.

They took his family now he must harvest thier souls in fields of pain. No in all seriousness this show is great for little kids that love tractors, not a lot of options out there. I bet I have watched it over 10 times with my boy. The mix of real tractors and a story is a neat concept.
Fun and educational
My 3 yr. old grandson loves this show!
My kids love the books & the show.
I have two grandsons ages 2 and 3. They both loved it.
My 2 year old's favorite show!

It's a cute video. Definitely for fans of the Tractor Mac book series or tractors in general. My three year old loves the books and the video. It teaches kids about tractors and shows how the books are illustrated. So young artists might enjoy this too.
My son loved it. We actually ordered a couple books after watching the show.
My boys love this show! I need to look for the books!
Great kid show! Catchy songs
It was awesome
3yr old enjoyed it.
My grandson is tractor crazy and loves this video.  I like that it is educational as well as entertaining.  How many 3 year olds can tell you what an air filter does?

Our grandson loves this movie.  We're impressed with Billy Steers' stories and his illustrations.

Grandson love it! And so did Grandpa!
Great for young kids who like tractors and educational for the kids who might not too be familiar with them
My two year old loves the combination of the story telling and real tractors!
Our son love this

My three year old could watch this all day! Wish it was a series and not just one episode. Love it!
This video was fabulous for children who like tractors.  Would like to see more of these videos made!!
Excellent for young tractor lovers. Very informative. My son (4) really enjoys watching it. We are a John Deere collecting family, but anything tractor-related is still loved in our house :-)
Grandson enjoyed the actual stories - not so much the parts between with the author/illustrator.
Fun and cute show for young kids interested trucks, tractors, and anything else along those lines.
Good mix of old tractors on parade and education about engines and tractor parts. The music is great and way better than other tractor/equipment shows!
My son loves John deere action video. Sadly this did not compare. He wasn't entertained at all. He is 5. Back to John Deere action
My kids LOVE this show! It is so much fun!  We watch it daily! My 20 month old walks around saying tractor.
MY 2.5 YR OLD LOVED IT!
Grandson loved it!
So great for the fans of this amazing book series!
I bought this book for my three year old grandson who loves Tractor Mac.  So glad these books are once again in print.

I really liked this video for my two year old.  We have seen almost all of the John Deere videos and it was nice to finally find this one that was different.  And the songs are much better too!!  I personally liked the fact that it revolved around reading a book as well.  My son has just started showing interest in "reading" books.
My kids just loooove this show!!
My kid loves this.

Thanks.
great gift
My five year old son loves the books, and has enjoyed watching this mix of real tractor videos and pictures from book read by the author.
My grandchildren love this DVD.  Couldn't have found a better one.
My son is more interested in the real tractors and gets distracted by the story line.

Love, love, love this.  A real stand out among mediocre DVD offerings for toddlers/preschoolers.  This one is better because it alternates live tractor action with narrated and illustrated stories and songs.  Not kiddy songs, but ones sung by a grown up.  The two books that Billy Steers reads are Tractor Mac Tune Up and Tractor Mac Harvest Time.  I recommend getting those too so your child can read along.  Super cute and just the right length.  As a bonus for an older preschooler, Billy Steers teaches you how to draw Tractor Mac at the end of the DVD.
My kids love this movie. Thank you!

He loves race cars and McQueen, but Tractor Mac is #1 now. It teaches the parts of the tractor, engine and other farm equipment with words printed for my 5 year old granddaughter to read and learn on the video, NOT boring for them. They both know almost all the parts after just a couple times watching. They are learning so much about the farm life that I grew up on which thrills me since we had IH tractors. I point out some of the models we had. I also have the CD with 3 of the stories and I am ordering the book set that goes with it, and the plates. He is totally thrilled with Tractor Mac. The end of the DVD shows how Bill Sears draws the pictures for the book. He really knows how to capture the attention throughout the entire video with learning songs and music. It is not animated, which I was concerned at first if they would even stick with it, but it is very well done to hold their attention.

My 3.5 year old son was excited to have a dvd on CASE... but truly this dvd misses the mark for repeated entertainment. We own the John Deere series and he watches those daily. This one he watched 2x and felt it was enough for months.
Really awesome video one of my wife's best friends and cousins love for their day care center. The children enjoy watching it a lot. Thanks So Much Keith & Aubrianna
My son loves this movie, and loves tractors.  He got this two weeks ago and has watched it almost every day since.  Great addition to the Tractor Mac books.
kids love it
my almost 2year old loves this,he even try's to sing the tractor Mac song.
Horrible.  Waste of money and time.

It your child loves tractors they will love this video!  It shows real tractors and the author reads 2 of his friendly Tractor Mac stories.  It's a great tool if you want your child to meet an author, but can't in person.

Having watched this many, many, many, many, many times with my three-year-old son, I must say that it had a high rewatchability. Two charming stories, read by author Billy Steers, good tractor footage ( especially for IH fans) and fun, singable songs. My only regrets is that they didn't shoot more episodes.
Love Tractor Mac!!!  One of my top five childrens book series!!!!!!!!!!
My three year old grandson loves Tractor Mac, so this was a big hit!!
My son loves tractor Mac. He asks for this show all the time! Wish they would do more of the books.
My grandson is all about tractors!!!  He loves it!!!
